list.name: FIDGET-SPINNER
list.description: Dynamike spins furiously with increased movement speed and throws multiple sticks of dynamite around himself. Each dynamite deals x damage to enemies.
list.descriptionHtml: Dynamike spins furiously with increased movement speed and throws multiple sticks of dynamite around himself. Each dynamite deals x damage to enemies.

list.name: SATCHEL-CHARGE
list.description: Once activated, the next main attack also stuns enemies for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Once activated, the next main attack also stuns enemies for x seconds.
